SummaryEnglish: In a world where heroism is a punishment, Xylo Forbartz, a condemned goddess killer, battles endless hordes of monstrous abominations as part of Penal Hero Unit 9004. Death is no escape, only a cycle of resurrection and relentless combat. But when Xylo encounters a mysterious new goddess, their unlikely alliance sparks a rebellion that could shatter the chains of eternal punishment.
Aliases: Punishment for Brave Hero-9004 Corps Prison Record
Sentenced to Be a Hero: The Prison Records of Penal Hero Unit 9004
